results.content: Good introduction of angularjs, easy understanding and clarity in explanation, encourages deeper into Angujarjs tool. I hope the instructor provide another way for a greater understanding of angularjs with databases in the Back-End
results.content_html: Good introduction of angularjs, easy understanding and clarity in explanation, encourages deeper into Angujarjs tool. I hope the instructor provide another way for a greater understanding of angularjs with databases in the Back-End

results.content:
This course covers material that is required for anyone serious about Angular development. It covers this material in a fast-paced and concise way. It includes good explanations of core concepts such as controllers, templates, dependency injection, data bindings, directives & routing - things a novice user might stumble over. The course starts with a good introduction to project seeds and scaffolds – these tools are particularly useful to starting real angular projects without having to know all the sticky details before you start. Subsequently, the course demonstrates the mechanics of use for each of the core concepts thru a realistic demo project. 
Overall, the instructional quality of this video series is good and explanations presented certainly addresses the key concepts. Because angular has a relatively steep learning curve it is unlikely this course will be the only course a beginner would need but it is a good place to start.

Subsequently, the course demonstrates the mechanics of use for each of the core concepts thru a realistic demo project.
Overall, the instructional quality of this video series is good and explanations presented certainly addresses the key concepts. Because angular has a relatively steep learning curve it is unlikely this course will be the only course a beginner would need but it is a good place to start.
